name: The KIT
description:
To complete your order add 


Keepn It Virgin want all our angels to use the finest stainless steel needles and strong thread with minimal breakage... 

Package includes:

1 needle 

1 160 yard spool   (colorvaries) black brown biege

1 Silk head scarf (blackonly)



Total pacakage: 1 needle and 1 spool 160 yrd thread

name: Brazilian Curly
description:
Brazilian Hair is the most sought after texture on the market right now! The hair is used diversely and for the density. Textures blends with most ethnic backgrounds. Brazilian hair is extremely luxurious and very soft.

Hair comes in a natural color (1b-4) soft black- true brown

**minimal shedding, but a normal amount of shedding for curly textures.

Curly textured  hair requires lots of moisture and is very high maintenance; more so in longer lengths. To maintain curl each day you will need to activate the curls with a water/conditioner mix to detangle/condition it with a moisturizing conditioner often. 

****This texture is best for someone very experienced with both Virgin and curly hair textures******



Recommend for full install 2-3 bundles

name: Brazilian Big Wave
description:
Brazilian Hair is the most sought after texture on the market right now! The hair is used diversely and for the density. Textures blends with most ethnic backgrounds. Brazilian hair is extremely luxurious and very soft.

Hair comes in a natural color (1b-4) soft black- true brown

** Wave hair has a mixture of waves with curls giving the extra glam one wants in their hair.


Hair has minimal to no shedding. 

Recommend for full install 2-3 bundles
